description:
A simple and elegant stopwatch for Palm/HP webOS, inspired by the iOS app.
This was my very first webOS app, released to the PivotCE PreWare feed in 2018 -- you can still find it there, but its an old version. Despite multiple requests to update that listing, it has been unchanged since December 2018. In order to release updates, I'm reposting the app here, with a different AppId. The old version and this one can co-exist, but the old one will never get updates, its recommended you uninstall the Preware version if you have it, and use this one instead.
versionNote:
0.0.7 - Initial experimental release 0.1.1 - Both modes mostly working
0.1.3 - Resolves an issue where timer wouldn't reset in certain launch situtations
1.0.0 - Stopwatch now survives the app being killed and re-launched, laps survive scene changes
1.0.1 - Support really long stopwatch times
1.0.2 - Selectable alarm sound in timer!
1.0.3 - Bug fixes for long timer value
1.0.4 - Add support for My Watch to notify a Pebble when a timer finishes.
1.1.0 - Re-release for App Museum, adds Timer pause and fixes notification sounds
1.1.1 - Fix a bug where Timer face is tappable while paused
